=== Can I get a patch included in the Ubuntu Kernel? / How can I submit a patch to the Ubuntu Kernel? ===

Normally we consider patches for inclusion which are sent to the <code>kernel-team@lists.ubuntu.com</code> email list.
See <nowiki>[[Kernel-Dev-KernelPatches]]</nowiki> for more details.
